name: ServiceNow CMDB Configuration Template
description: ServiceNow CMDB configuration record to add and remove CMDB records on create and delete of a server.

metadata.longDescription: ServiceNow CMDB configuration record to add and remove CMDB records on create and delete of a server. This integration template is responsible for the create of a ServiceNow CMDB record and is designed to be chained after the creation of a server. Upon deletion of a server, the template will delete the CMDB record from ServiceNow.

bullets.title: Operating Systems Supported
bullets.description: Not applicable, run locally on the Terraform Server.

bullets.title: Software Deployed
bullets.description: Create and Remove a CMDB Record in ServiceNow.

bullets.title: Default Virtual Machine Settings
bullets.description:
• python ServiceNow module deployed on the Terraform container.
  • This integration script is run locally on the terraform container.

bullets.title: Usage and Special Notes
bullets.description:
1. A ServiceNow instance must be available.
  2. The ServiceNow instance must be network accessible from the Terraform container.
  3. Upon deletion, the CMDB record is removed from ServiceNow.
